title: Respondent and operant behaviour (TEFC)

description: Episode number 1 of Series "Behaviour Theory in Practice". Defines respondent and operant behaviour and shows laboratory experiments with mice, pigeons etc. illustrating biological and non- biological reinforcers and conditioning. Dogs and children demonstrate learned responses. Narrated by Jack K. Burton.
